Package agent

Class NodesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.NodesManager
  • public class NodesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A NodeManager manages each single Node, its sensors and the samples that are generated.
    Author:
    Daniele Carta, Cristian C. Spagnuolo

      • publishSample

        public void publishSample​(Sample sample)
        Publish the input sample on the correct MQTT topic. This method is called by the thread associated to the sensor that generates the given sample.
        Parameters:
        sample - the sample to be included in the payload of the MQTT publish.
